title: Occult - Jean Dubuis Alchemy Course (pdf) EarthBow
description:
Jean Dubuis is widely recognized as the most influential alchemist of the 20th century. Although his course on alchemy and kabbalah were finished over 25 years ago, they are still considered by many to be the finest works of their type ever published.

What many people don't understand, however, is that these works were designed to be studied in a specific order. Many of the later books assume one has read and understands the previous works.

These books can be found online, but I have not seen them presented in their proper order. No doubt this has caused problems, and I suspect many have given up in frustration, thinking the course too complex to understand and master.

I have assembled the complete course (all in pdf format) and offer them here in the correct order. I have also included his most recent work, which builds upon his earlier material while presenting a fresh perspective.

Part 1 - Fundamentals
   Dubuis, Jean - The Fundamentals Of Esoteric Knowledge

Part 2 - Spagyrics  (Plant Alchemy)
   Dubuis, Jean - Spagyrics Vol 1
   Dubuis, Jean - Spagyrics Vol 2

Part 3 - Mineral Alchemy
   Dubuis, Jean - Mineral Alchemy Vol 1
   Dubuis, Jean - Mineral Alchemy Vol 2
   Dubuis, Jean - Mineral Alchemy Vol 3
   Dubuis, Jean - Mineral Alchemy Vol 4

Part 4 - Kabbalah (Qabala)
   Dubuis, Jean - Qabala, The Philosophers of Nature Vol 1
   Dubuis, Jean - Qabala, The Philosophers of Nature Vol 2
   Dubuis, Jean - Qabala, The Philosophers of Nature Vol 3

Part 5 - Additional Material
   Dubuis, Jean - The Experience of Eternity



Note: I will be adding many more titles soon, Search for "EarthBow" for a list of available titles.

As always, comments (good or bad) are appreciated

Keywords: esoteric, occult, alchemy, spagyrics, PON, kabbalah, qabala, qabbala, qabbalah
